text:
P. Pakalavan, Superintendent of Police, Vellore has ordered an inquiry into a voice recording of a conversation reportedly between an inspector of Ambur sub-division and a suspect in a woman missing case.

The audio in which the inspector uses abusive language and calls himself a “rowdy” was circulated on Whatsapp.

In the recording, the man introduces himself as inspector of Omarabad police station and threatens Velu, a suspect, . saying that he will be booked on charges of rape, kidnap and attempt to murder if he does not bring back the woman.

Officials said the inspector claimed that the recording was fabricated.

The SP said, “We are conducting an inquiry into the recording..” - Staff Reporter
title: Police to hold inquiry into voice recording
